params.ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
params.ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.

params.taskDescription:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>p</mi>
  <mo>∨<!-- ∨ --></mo>
  <mi>q</mi>
  <mo>∧<!-- ∧ --></mo>
  <mi>r</mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">→<!-- → --></mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext> </mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mtext>~</mtext>
  <mi>s</mi>
  <mo>∧<!-- ∧ --></mo>
  <mi>t</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">p \vee q \wedge r \to {\text{ }}\text{~}s \wedge t</annotation></semantics></math>

params.taskDescription:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mtext>~</mtext>
  <mi>p</mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">→<!-- → --></mo>
  <mi>q</mi>
  <mo>∨<!-- ∨ --></mo>
  <mi>r</mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">↔<!-- ↔ --></mo>
  <mi>p</mi>
  <mo>∧<!-- ∧ --></mo>
  <mi>s</mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">→<!-- → --></mo>
  <mtext>~</mtext>
  <mi>t</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\text{~}p \to q \vee r \leftrightarrow p \wedge s \to \text{~}t</annotation></semantics></math>

questionSetStimulus: For each of the following compound logical statements, apply the proper dominance of connectives by adding parentheses to indicate the order to evaluate the statement.
